title: Monsters Attacking Enemy Models
text:
Order of Execution: When a Monster's attack coincides with another in-game rule(s), the Monster will always resolve its attack last.

- y The enemy model ends its activation within melee reach of a Monster.

- y The enemy model disengages from the Monster via an Advance / Charge / Effigy Recall . The Monster will execute a Parting Blow against them.
